entry.def: When the police or the army put a roadblock across a road, they stop all the traffic going through, for example because they are looking for a criminal.

example.ex: The city police set up roadblocks to check passing vehicles.
example.tran: 该市警察设置了路障以检查过往车辆。

means.word_mean: 1. any condition that makes it difficult to make progress or to achieve an objective;
2. a barrier set up by police to stop traffic on a street or road in order to catch a fugitive or inspect traffic etc.
